column3: “Shortly after smoking you will feel a strong head buzz building up; then, right before it peaks, the sensation disperses throughout your body making you feel comfortably heavy. Suddenly you find yourself covered by a blanket of relaxation and euphoria as you enter a neurological black hole in which time, sounds, and thoughts are stretched and morphed. My favorite thing about this strain is that it allows you to focus...”
“Was a great strain to wind down after work, recommended by my bud tender who was super happy with it just after a lunch break WINK WINK! LMAO! so I just had to look & feel that good,  THX PARC!”

“Love the taste right off the bat it taste like berries I'm getting the piney smell and also a sweet smell it's a relaxing smoke really good feelings feels like my muscles are all relaxed so that's good 😂😂 smoking this at  3am so this might be good enough to knock me out for the night so so good strain i'd smoke again”
“I just smoked a small bowl of this incredible strain and I love it. i thought Midnight kush was the best flavor and high I've ever had. this is my new favorite strain.”

“Not recommending this for people who suffer from mood swings, Bipolar Disorder, or any type of chemical imbalance in the brain.  I only say that because my friend has crazy mood swings, pretty sure she's Bipolar, this made her nuts.  She went through every emotion in 2 hours - it was entertaining, but insane to experience and watch.  However, for me, it was pretty good for a late night smoke - rolled this with a Gree...”
“This hits hard and heavy, smoking and vapping at sametime”
“Amazing, I had a blast with the great tasting Berry OG”

“This stuff has got me feeling as happy as a clam. It also sparked my creative side. I felt completely comfortable and calm throughout my entire high, even when I was filled with excitement it was a calm sort of peaceful excitement. 10/10 would buy again and recommend for anyone and everyone:)”
“I would argue this to be a fairly heavy leaving Indica hybrid. Great for pain relief and relaxation. 2 bowls and I feel glorious.”
“Really awesome for pain relief. This bud is also absolutely beautiful and smooth.”
“Love this strain. I'm a fan of anything with blueberry in it, and OG kush is the best of the best for daytime smoking. It's like blue dream's indicate dominant cousin.”
“Super fruity stuff! Hit me like a pure indica.”

“This stuff has got me feeling as happy as a clam. It also sparked my creative side. I felt completely comfortable and calm throughout my entire high, even when I was filled with excitement it was a calm sort of peaceful excitement. 10/10 would buy again and recommend for anyone and everyone:)”

“This Berry OG was a strain I thought Id like since I prize OG Kush,and Ive had Blueberry,so I gave it a try. Wonderful flower! Sweet tasting,smooth smoking,and has relax in spades! You must try this tasty treat!”

“It has a beautiful aroma that you can't resist sticking your face in the bag and just getting a large whiff of. The high is very good, lots of calming tendencies. Do get a little bit munchy but that's not the worst thing that could happen. Overall, great bud.”
“GREAT HIGH”

“This was a go to when I couldn't get sleepy one night for bed.  I fell asleep earlier from some fire bud and still needed to sleep for the next day, so after a gram cone of this I was couch locked and heavy ready for bed.  I was also hungry as hell but went to bed without because I was too stoned to fix food! LOL  Great strain to have on hand when you need the heavy indica stone to bring the mind back to bed. I got t...”
“This was some really good shatter oil, its one of the ones that I have stuck to while going to the best shop on the Harbor Millers.”
“Smoked in small doses this strain is awesome. Smoked in big doses watch out you may get paranoid and think your girlfriends trying to kidnap you.”
“This is my new go to  strain for pain .”
“Very smooth very good with pain and discomfort uplifting tastey and happy gigglely would recommend to everybody is my fav”

“Giggly, talkative, engaged, creative!

What a thing”
“I love this strain for the pain relief it provides . helped relax my whole body and the taste is great!”
“Long day at work... Great relaxer”

“Got this at a med shop and to say the least it was very relaxing for a hybrid. Smelled sweetish and earth, hint of skunk. Tastes good and the smoke isn't too harsh. I was also very talkative, and slept very easy. Good for sleep and pain.”
“lovely smell, incredible taste, and very soothing mellow,and relaxing high. approved :)”
“Very smooth berry flavor with an instant high”

“Excellent strain.
The high lasted about 6 hours after a couple bowls.
Started off with a sativa high and the indica high kicked in later, had me locked on the couch after a an hour or two.”

“Very nice, the taste was absolutely amazing.  Covered in crystals. One bowl of this fine herb will leave you feeling very happy and euphoric. I give it a 9/10 on my scale. One of the best hybrids I have ever tryed.”
“Creative high, pain relief and euphoria”
“It was pretty great, it's about the funniest I've ever been.”
“After a few hits, You feel the euphoric hit, once you finish your down for the count... zzzZZZZZZ”
“Probably my favorite cannabis I’ve tried so far. Helped my anxiety, made me euphoric and happy.”
“Head buzz starts slowly, great for focus, high euphoria, PERFECT for sleep, deff lost track of time lol”
“It’s def ah sleeper😴😴😴”
“I'm a OG type of guy and I would say this bud is berry delightful (See what I Did there) but it can't beat Jet fuel OG”

“I really like this strain but only if I'm in the perfect environment. For me, it made me way more anxious when a stressful situation came up. other than that though, it was a hella chillen high but it was the first strain that didn't make me hungry”
“Very Nice!”
“Made me sweat, made me  hungry, made me happy!”
“it's amazing”
“this is a great all around for any time. you can take it or leave it day or night. this can be a motivator or a sedative. it feels like what you would expect in mixing a sativa and indica”
“This is my lb's HG. so I trust a guy I call lilbro". this batch let me down. however it has grab me by the face & made me cry Momma! Oh no! I forgot its a 4star
column4: hallupinyou creep of a creeper... oh momma...bye now.”"

column3: “Had the pleasure of a homie coming through with a big bag of this bud and I couldn't be more stoked on it. Great stone euphoric head high with a lasting body high if you get down too hard. Holds up well against my favorite strain Gorilla Glue.  Berry OG is definitely my #2 for sure”

“four and a half Stars should have been the rating as I'm pretty fond of this one. the blueberry brings out a great deal of relaxation and calm while the OG Kush helps to counteract the Indica feeling. not a good choice before bed but great for the rest of the day”

“OMG!!!! Think I am in LOVE...... went to Diego Pellicer for the first time today, & was blown away by that place! They recommended Apple Berry by Lucid; ( I normally am straight indica, or a hybrid that is mainly indica) & this is the BEST tasting strain I have ever had & it makes me Instantly relaxed, and happy. That was only after two hits from my vape! It usually takes quite a bit to make me feel this way- but thi...”
“An exvellent strain! All the sweetness of Blueberry and the high of OG Kush! Very euphoric and relaxing. This goes to a high place in my favorites.”
“so potent and a great body and head blast.   a few tokes and you can feel your eyes lower to near bliss.   Berry OG does live up to my standards”
